I read quite a few people gripe about their item being very shirt like. I was very intentional about selecting the "fleece" version. The non-fleece indeed looks like a very light layering peice. Shirt like even. There is a time and place for that! ... just not in my closet. This is indeed fleece. It is not a coat that is cotton and then lined with fleece. Perhaps that was what other reviewers sought? Fleece by itself and not being used as a lining, is indeed a light weight fabric, but it is warm. I'm not going to take it for a trek in the snow, but I live in Northern California and it's lovely for the foothills and valley for every day runabouts. It does flare as well! I bought a large so it would zip over my breasts. I'm 5'5" and rock a 34-36G so I intentionally size jackets to the most demanding part of me. Picture to be added after I clean my mirrors.

I am pissed that I again have to waste my time returning another piece of crap from Amazon.
